changeSet.sql: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE user_account ( user_id integer, user_name character varying(64), passwd character varying(255), first_name character varying(50), last_name character varying(50), email character varying(120), active_study integer, institutional_affiliation character varying(255), status_id integer, owner_id integer, date_created date, date_updated date, date_lastvisit timestamp without time zone, passwd_timestamp date, passwd_challenge_question character varying(64), passwd_challenge_answer character varying(255), phone character varying(64), user_type_id integer, update_id integer, enabled boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true, account_non_locked boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true, lock_counter integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, run_webservices boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, access_code character varying(64), time_zone character varying(255) DEFAULT ''::character varying, enable_api_key boolean DEFAULT false, api_key character varying(255) ) SERVER app_database_server OPTIONS (schema_name 'public', table_name 'user_account');
